I
1111 0000 0000 0000
1000 1000 1000 1000
1111 0000 0000 0000
1000 1000 1000 1000

O
1100 1100 0000 0000
1100 1100 0000 0000
1100 1100 0000 0000
1100 1100 0000 0000

L
1000 1000 1100 0000
1110 1000 0000 0000
1100 0100 0100 0000
0010 1110 0000 0000

J
0100 0100 1100 0000
1000 1110 0000 0000
1100 1000 1000 0000
1110 0010 0000 0000

S
0110 1100 0000 0000
1000 1100 0100 0000
0110 1100 0000 0000
1000 1100 0100 0000

Z
1100 0110 0000 0000
0100 1100 1000 0000
1100 0110 0000 0000
0100 1100 1000 0000

T
1110 0100 0000 0000
0100 1100 0100 0000
0100 1110 0000 0000
1000 1100 1000 0000

Piece represented as u64, u16 
    u64 is 4 u16s with u16 is 4x4 spot
    u16 is 2 of rotation, i6 i6 of x y where x y is top left corner

Board:
    <--x, y down
    u16 array, 0-2 (3 spaces) as right side padding, n-3 - n-1 (3 spaces) of down padding
    collision detection makes sure moves that would write 1 to the padded space is illegal
